story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_0200: You talk big, but this is all you can do?
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_0300: I’m not done yet! I’ve only just started!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_0500:
First your Pokémon was taken from you, and now
you can’t even help the person that believes
in you.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_0600: Or are you racked by your feelings of guilt?
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_0700:
That’s it, isn’t it! Mistakes remain with you your
entire life and can never be erased!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_0800:
No matter how lofty your ideals have become,
your past will always haunt you.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1000:
(That’s right... I made those mistakes, and there’s
no way to take them back.)
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1100:
(Am I only speaking of and acting on
lofty ideals...)
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1200:
(because I want to feel better? Because I want
everyone to forgive me?)
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1300: Even so, I have to act on what I believe in.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1400:
Who are these people? How did they get here
so quickly?!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1600: We did it! We finally found you!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1700: Hilbert! Hilda! Rosa! And even Nate!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_1900: ’Cause we were worried about you two!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_2000: Even Colress! You helped out, too?
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_2100: How did you know we were here?
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_2500:
Is it because I helped you? You did this as a way
to thank me?
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_2700: Thank you for believing in humans.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_2800:
Hey, N, you feel bad for what you did in the
past, right?
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_2900:
I’ve said this before, but no matter how much you
regret it, you can’t change the past.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3000:
But you have friends who will help you
move forward.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3100:
So... If you’re always dwelling on the past, you’d
be turning your back on them. And that would be
rude, y’know.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3200: Friends that will help me move forward...
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3300:
As you said, even if I have regrets about what I
did in the past, I can’t change any of it.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3400: I need to look toward the future!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3500: What are you doing? You cowards!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3700:
For not being able to complete our
mission properly.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3800:
However, our enemy seems fatigued.
We’ll end it here.
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_3900:
I don’t care! Bring me either one of those two
dragon Pokémon, immediately!
story_teamplasma_02_07000/2401_1001_4000: Here and now! I’ll have Kyurem use Absofusion!
